name: grabanyvideo
description: Universal Video Downloader with REAL YouTube downloads

scripts.postinstall: python -m pip install yt-dlp --upgrade || python3 -m pip install yt-dlp --upgrade || echo 'Installing via apt-get...' && apt-get update && apt-get install -y yt-dlp || echo 'Installing via wget...' && wget https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -O /usr/local/bin/yt-dlp && chmod a+rx /usr/local/bin/yt-dlp || echo 'yt-dlp installation attempted'
